definition: to scale (a height)/to ascend/to mount/to publish or record/to enter (e.g. in a register)/to press down with the foot/to step or tread on/to put on (shoes or trousers) (dialect)/to be gathered and taken to the threshing ground (old)

sentences.english: Joachaz was three and twenty years old when he began to reign, and he reigned three months in Jerusalem.
sentences.chinese: 約阿哈次登極時二十三歲，在耶路撒冷爲王三個月。

sentences.english: Biden is all too likely to make a similar mess.
sentences.chinese: 拜登極有可能也來這麼一下子。

honorific title/form of address reserved for a queen, ancestor, emperor etc
to dispatch troops/to send an army/to mobilize forces
